title: Introduction to C Programming
short_description: The fundamentals of programming with 'Introduction to C Programming.' Master the basics of C language in this comprehensive course.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
short_description: Algorithmic problem-solving in 'Introduction to Algorithms.' Learn foundational concepts for efficient coding and computational thinking.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
short_description: Start your journey into data structures and algorithms with 'Introduction to C++ for DSA.' Learn essential coding skills.

title: Basic Data Structures
short_description: Build a solid foundation in computer science with 'Basic Data Structures.' Learn essential structures for efficient programming.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
short_description: Unlock OOP's power with 'Introduction to OOP Python.' Learn Python's OOP principles for versatile and efficient coding.

title: Software Engineering
short_description: Explore Software Engineering: Principles, methodologies, and practices for building efficient and reliable software systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
short_description: Master AWS and cloud computing: Scale, secure, and innovate with the leading cloud platform, Amazon Web Services.

title: Database (MySQL)
short_description: Master MySQL database management: Learn to design, query, and optimize databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.

title: Problem-Solving Part
short_description: Enhance your problem-solving skills: Dive into real-world challenges and develop effective strategies for tackling complex issues
